This file is also documented in README.md in the "Configuration" section.
hostname: Which IP or hostname you want ExpressJS to listen on.
port: Which port you want ExpressJS to listen on.

router.account: Optional. A Mastodon User ID to track.

mastodon.instance: The Mastodon instance where you registered the Token.

links.Icon name: and link key/value pair to add at the bottom of the page.
